thread.title: 94 Drake Lyrics From "More Life" That Were Made For Your Instagram
thread.title_full: 94 Drake Lyrics From "More Life" That Were Made For Your Instagram

author: Michelle Rennex
title: 94 Drake Lyrics From "More Life" That Were Made For Your Instagram
text:
1. I don’t take naps. Me and the money are way too attached to go and do that. – “Gyalchester”
2. Never chase it, let it come to you. – “Jorja Interlude”
3. You better watch out for me, I’m bound to glow. – “Glow”
4. Winning is problematic. People like you more when you working towards something, not when you have it. – “Lose You”
5. Worried ‘bout taking my lane, they ain’t even got on my road. – “Jorja Interlude”
6. My whole team winning, we don’t play your game. – “Skepta Interlude”
7. They want me gone, wait for the kicker. Bury me now and I only get bigger. – “Gyalchester”
8. Like Martin Luther, man, I had a dream. – “Skepta Interlude”
9. Your boy all glowed up. Every time we touch down bet it go up. – “Glow”
10. It’s a marathon, not a sprint, but I still gotta win the race. – “Sacrifices”
11. I’m in it for the glory, not the honour mention. – “Lose You”
12. Fuck being rich when I’m forty man, I’m tryna make it now. – “Portland”
13. Got the Austin Powers, a man’s extra groovy. – “Skepta Interlude”
14. Went and got diplomas, and we still going dumb. – “Lose You”
15. Taking shots, feeling bulletproof. – “Portland”
16. I know I deserve more, I just never said it. Two middle fingers as I make an exit. – “Lose You”
17. I went off in the ’16, give me ’17. – “Can’t Have Everything” ID: 10728830 View this image ›
Young Money Entertainment
ID: 10728803 18. Watch how you speak on my name, you know? – “Free Smoke”
19. Fake fuck with me back then but it’s getting hard for you to fake it now. – “Portland”
20. My heart is way too frozen to get broken. – “Madiba Riddim”
21. They don’t know they got to be faster than me to get to me. No one’s done it successfully. – “Do Not Disturb”
22. Don’t switch on me, I got big plans. – “Blem”
23. Love is just not in my plans, not even taking a chance. – “Kmt”
24. Voodoo spells on my life. It won’t work, they have all tried. – “Madiba Riddim”
25. I’m blem for real, I might just say how I feel. – “Blem”
26. You come with beef, I eat the beat. – “Sacrifices”
27. Move from me when you’re extra, move from me with the passa. – “Blem”
28. Take this shit to heart, it’s always executed perfectly. – “Do Not Disturb”
ID: 10728823 View this image ›
Young Money Entertainment
ID: 10728818 29. My mama said you was bad news, you proved her right, every single night. – “Since Way Back”
30. Passionate from miles away, passive with the things you say. – “Passionfruit”
31. Something ain’t right when we talking, look like you hiding your problems. – “Fake Love”
32. I’m running, but can’t run away. – “4422”
33. I wanna know, how come we can never slash and stay friends? – “Blem”
34. Listen. Seeing you got ritualistic. Cleansing my soul of addiction for no. – “Passionfruit”
35. I know I fear trust, I know I fear fear too much. – “4422”
36. Hard at building trust from a distance. I think we should rule out commitment for now – “Passionfruit”
37. I don’t need no advice. You’re not here and we both know why. – “Blem”
38. Tension between us just like picket fences. – “Passionfruit”
39. You’re to blame for what we could have been ‘cause look at what we are. – “Teenage Fever”
40. You built it up to break it halfway through. – “4422”
41. Ask about that, you would say it was nothing but here’s another nothing that you made into something. – “Nothings Into Somethings”
42. Your heart is hard to carry after dark. – “Teenage Fever”
43. You say you changed but you never change up. – “4422”
44. Leaving? You’re just doing that to get even. – “Passionfruit”
ID: 10728839 View this image ›
Young Money Entertainment
ID: 10728813 45. I cannot tell who is my friend. I need distance between me and them. – “Madiba Riddim”
46. Two-faced mans* back around with the three face. – “Can’t Have Everything”
47. I got fake people showing fake love to me, straight up to my face. – “Fake Love”
48. Bring us up, I never take us down, but if you bring me up, then they might take you down. – “Portland”
49. I don’t trust a word you say. How you wanna clique up after your mistakes? – “Fake Love”
50. The city gets stronger when everybody is speaking, not when everybody out here beefing. – “Lose You”
51. That’s when they smile in my face, whole time they wanna take my place. – “Fake Love”
52. Dissing but got pictures with me smiling though. – “Do Not Disturb”
53. I wanna move to Dubai, so I don’t never have to kick it with none of you guys. – “Free Smoke”
54. They turn they back and they leave you, they gon’ be back when they need you. – “Jorja Interlude”
ID: 10728841 View this image ›
Young Money Entertainment
ID: 10728820 55. You need me to get that shit together, so we can get together. – “Get It Together”
56. He did a number on you that must be why you move so icy. – “Ice Melts”
57. You said that you think about me every day: Saturday to Saturday. – “Since Way Back”
58. Can’t get Nobu, but you can get Milestone. – “Gyalchester”
59. I need someone to hold me, I need someone that needs me, I need someone that loves me. – “Get It Together”
60. We need to forward to the islands and get you gold, no spray tans. – “Blem”
61. You know, we don’t have to be dramatic. Just romantic. – “Get It Together”
62. God knows I’m trying. God knows I’m trying for you. – “Madiba Riddim”
63. I still need some satisfaction. A little less talk and a little more action. – “Ice Melts”
64. I’ve got bitches and they’re murky, swervin’, lookin’ all curvy. – “Kmt”
65. Got a new Maybach, she wanna fuck on the drive home. – “Gyalchester”
66. Growing up I was a running back. You never made me ran once. – “Sacrifices”
67. I need you to stop running back to your ex, he’s a wasteman. – “Blem”
68. Out of body. That’s just how I feel when I’m around you, shawty. – “Teenage Fever”
ID: 10728838 View this image ›
Young Money Entertainment
ID: 10728817 69. You tryna date her and she been let me walk twice. – “No Long Talk”
70. So much hate inside your heart, we don’t even know what we done to you. – “Jorja Interlude”
71. How they go from not wanting me at all to wanting to see me lose it all? – “Lose You”
72. I seen man turn fool for the money one too many times. – “Madiba Riddim”
73. Yeah, my side girl got a 5S with the screen cracked. Still hit me back right away, better not never hesitate. – “Portland”
74. She complaining how I’m late, I ain’t know it was a date. – “Sacrifices”
75. Everything these days is textual. I just want to get a little sexual with you. – “Since Way Back”
76. Now they like, ‘Aren’t you adorable?’ I know the question rhetorical. – “Free Smoke”
77. I seen some girls turn they back on they best friend from time. – “Madiba Riddim”
78. I’m a magnet for bad bitches. You got the going out, sad bitches. – “Portland”
79. Block that account, it’s a catfish. – “Skepta Interlude”
ID: 10728826 View this image ›
Young Money Entertainment
ID: 10728822 80. Anointed and protected, I was chosen. – “Madiba Riddim”
81. Me and being broke finally broke up. – “Glow”
82. I gotta do mansion ‘cause I outgrew condo. – “Gyalchester”
83. Check my account, it’s a madness. – “Skepta Interlude”
84. Hermès link, ice-blue mink. – “Gyalchester”
85. More blessings because I’m generous. – “Do Not Disturb”
86. We seeing so many blessings, shit don’t make no sense. – “Sacrifices”
87. Man are getting bread now, this is that hard dough. – “Kmt”
88. Things get dark, but my aura just starts glowing. – “Lose You”
89. We evolved, used to think vacation meant Niagara Falls. – “Can’t Have Everything”
90. I’ll probably self-destruct if I ever lose, but I never do. – “Do Not Disturb”
91. I brought the game to its knees. I make too much these days to ever say, ‘Poor me’. – “Free Smoke”
92. Seasons go by like I’m binge-watching. – “Do Not Disturb”
93. Still the same guy when I touched a million, I say how it is and no fucks are given. – “Skepta Interlude”
94. We all so spoiled now: More life, more everything. – “Free Smoke”
ID: 10728832 @aubreygifs / Via aubreysgifs.tumblr.com
@aubreygifs / Via aubreysgifs.tumblr.com
 ID: 10735707 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
 More News About Drake Michelle Rennex is a staff writer for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
